topic.title: Are there "sub-reddits" here so to speak?
topic.body: If so, how do you access/view them?

1_1LoyRxaxKN6jn6urKfUeqPFuV37BNJFDc5.body:
> [lukipuki](#comment_25_1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8): I am not sure about the exact inner workings of websites, yet.So the Espagnol/Fr/Rus sites are indeed different 'sites'?That is cool!
> Could you add something like a SciFi-site/reddit/
> btw I want to propose a certain nomenclature: subreddits/subforums could be called (drummroll):'subzeros' :)

I believe they are clones with some editing so they have the same feel (correct me if I'm wrong). 

"Subzero"s sounds so cool!

> [lukipuki](#comment_26_1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8): is the plural of it subzeroes or subzeros ? (no native speaker here... )

Well the plural of zero is zeroes, so I'd probably say subzeroes, not too sure though.
